<rule id="springboot-cache-to-quarkus-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                    <or>
                        <dependency artifactId="spring-boot-starter-cache" groupId="org.springframework.boot"/>
                        <project>
                            <artifact artifactId="spring-boot-starter-cache" groupId="org.springframework.boot"/>
                        </project>
                    </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the SpringBoot cache artifact with Quarkus 'spring-cache' extension">
                    <message>
                        Replace the SpringBoot Cache module artifact with Quarkus `spring-cache` extension

                        Add Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-spring-cache`
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/spring-cache" title="Quarkus Extension for Spring Cache API Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
